overview:
Malleries is a multi-seller Luxury mall is a must for anyone shopping for a an authentic Hermes, Chanel, Louis Vuitton, as other premier designer handbag, jewelry or clothing. Malleries has a zero-tolerance for non-authentic designer items and sellers are Pre-Screened for Reputation, Integrity, Authenticity of items, Professionalism and Philosophy. Every item listed is guaranteed to be authentic.

Over 4,000 Designer Items, new arrivals everyday. Our inventory includes a wide variety of authentic nearly new, vintage, and limited edition Louis Vuitton, Hermes, Chanel, Gucci, Balenciaga, Bottega Veneta, Marc Jacobs, Prada, Christian Dior, Burberry, Todâ€™s, Coach and many more luxury designer brands handbags, shoulder bags, wallets, luggage, jewelry, watches, shoes and clothing at a discount off retail prices.

You can sell, buy or consign your luxury designer items at Malleries.
